channel.title: Reference :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Reference Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Page type: Navigation Content type: Guide Hub A guide hub is the main navigation page for a section, such as learn, plan, or build. It begins with “Who this section is for?” and how the user may have gotten to this page, i.

item.title: APIs
item.description: The Okta APIs Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Description: This is a short summary redirect pointing the developer to the new Redocly site where all API related material is located Why is this here?: Internal workshop session: Session 1 - Team 2 chose the Okta APIs group.

item.title: SDKs
item.description: SDKs Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: IA defined in a separate document Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Description: This page describes and lists all supported SDKs supported by Okta. It does not go into specific use cases Links to original docs: See this doc for the overall structure and content: New Code | SDK Libraries Page Version 2: https://docs.

item.title: Inline Hooks
item.description: Okta Inline Hooks Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Description: This is a short summary redirect pointing the developer to the new Redocly site where all Hooks API related material is located Links to original docs: Original doc: https://developer.

item.title: Velocity template language
item.description: Velocity template language Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Links to original docs: Doc content is pulled from several docs: Customize email notifications: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/custom-email/main/ Velocity template language (help docs): https://help.okta.com/en-us/content/topics/settings/velocity-variables.htm Page type: Reference Content type: Lookup lists and tables A series of tables or lists where users can look up facts or definitions, interspersed with short explanatory texts that give those tables the correct context.

item.title: Okta expression language
item.description: Okta expression language Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Links to original docs: “Legacy” Expression Language : https://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/okta-expression-language/ (intro, popular expressions, unsupported features) Expression Language in IDX : https://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/okta-expression-language-in-identity-engine/ Page type: Reference Content type: Lookup lists and tables

item.title: Roles, resources, and permissions
item.description: Manage access to Org objects with role assignments Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Links to original docs: Make this guide into a reference guide: Role assignment: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/role-assignment/ Page type: Task Content type: How-to with code A “How-to with code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that involves writing code.

item.title: Glossary
item.description: Glossary of terms Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Page type: Reference Content type: Glossary A Glossary is a list of often difficult or specialized words and acronyms with their definitions, in this case specific to IAM and Okta topics and products.
